name: v3.2.3
body:
# Fast DDS v3.2.3

This minor release includes the following **features**:

* Send only non-default QoS & Use `serialize_optional_qos` for optional QoS in EDP messages (#5795)
* Add `WireProtocolConfigQos` to optionals serialization and make `Monitor Service` always serialize optionals (#5818)
* RPC over DDS example (#5829)
* Bump to asio 1.34.2 (#5902)
* Support aliases in Content Filtered Topic (#6048)
* Add methods for TypeObject registration of RPC types (#6056)

This minor release includes the following **improvements**:

* Add regression test checking type_information is always copied in `ProxyDatas` copies (#5797)
* Address some compilation warnings with latest `GCC` (#5796)
* Improvements on RPC entities (#5801)
* Add references to documentation (#5817)
* Update ROSin imgage links in Readme (#5830)
* Avoid calling setIPv4 in TCPTransportInterface (#5892)
* Send heartbeat when `wait_for_all_acked` is called (#6103)
* Use binary search in `find_change_nts` (#6027)
* Improve latency tests (#6025)
* Apply uncrustify to all files (#6121)

This minor release includes the following **fixes**:

* Update reception timestamp when it is added to the instance (#5819)
* Allow creation of built-in content filters with different type name (#5874)
* Set different content filter signatures for each requester (#5985)
* Allow ResourceLimitsQos serialization method compatibility (#5813)
* Solve Discovery Server race conditions (#5780)
* Properly delete secure endpoints if registration fails (#5814)
* Add condition for `string_builder` nullptr on XMLDynamicParser.cpp in case bound is 0 (#5821)
* Create RPC example participants with default profile (#5837)
* Avoid Data Race in Reader Locator (#5833)
* Add multicast locator to correct locator list in ReaderProxydata (#5842)
* Fix ParticipantGenericMessage serialization (#5843)
* Fix build on QNX (#5882)
* Fix DS initialization on "any" if no interfaces are available (#5876)
* Avoid sending duplicated ACKs in DataSharing (#6003)
* Allow empty partition list to match against `"*"` (#6007)
* Release change while authentication fails (#6021)
* Change non_blocking_send threshold to sendBufferSize (#6078)
* Remote writers considered volatile by default (#6086)
* Solve TCP disconnect while incomplete read deadlock (#6091)
* Handle maximum deadline misses case (#6096)
* Fix duplicated transport when using specific XML with CLI (#6010)
* Add localhost capability only to UDP & TCP transports (#5868)
* Fix doxygen documentation for `iHandle2GUID` (#5966)
* Avoid setting thread affinity of 0 in mac (#5970)
* Add missing field to xsd (#5994)
* Fix topic argument in Discovery Server example (#6015)
* Add missing IDL to code generator script (#6107)
* Do not export discovery server as cmake target (#6125)

This minor release includes the following **CI and release management updates**:

* Move `SimpleCommunication` and `system` tests in Windows nightly (#5789)
* Add compilation with latest `GCC` to `fastdds_alternative_builds` Ubuntu CI (#5799)
* Remove 2.10.x from PR template (#5836)
* Remove `3.1.x` from PR template and nightly for `3.1.x` and `2.10.x` (#5852)
* Move 2.10.x to EOL versions (#5857)
* Update `3.2.x` to be a supported branch (#5854)
* Split windows workflow (#5879)
* Correct Python fallback branch (#5884)
* Add `uncrustify` to Github CI (#5886)
* Install Fix OpenSSL version in windows example testing (#5919)
* Add VS143 toolset to Windows CI (#5916)
* Add `--quiet` to `git submodule` invocations (#5946)
* Fix doxygen to avoid errors in python bindings docstrings (#6037)
* Update fallback branches to use environment variables (#6043)
* Update fastcdr submodule to v2.3.3 (#6112)
* Split Mac CI build and testing phases (#6083)
* Remove RPC example (#6059)
* Regenerate types with Fast DDS Gen 4.0.5 (#6109)
* Use appropriate Discovery-Server repository branch (#6116)

PRs in merged order:
#5789, #5780, #5797, #5796, #5799, #5795, #5801, #5813, #5818, #5814, #5817, #5821, #5819, #5830, #5829, #5836, #5837, #5833, #5852, #5842, #5843, #5857, #5854, #5868, #5879, #5884, #5882, #5886, #5892, #5876, #5902, #5874, #5919, #5916, #5946, #5956, #5966, #5968, #5970, #6037, #6041, #6043, #5994, #6048, #6015, #6003, #6056, #6068, #6059, #6007, #6021, #6078, #6083, #6086, #6027, #6025, #6091, #5985, #6096, #6010, #6103, #6107, #6112, #6109, #6116, #6124, #6121, #6125

name: v3.4.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.4.0

This minor release includes the following **features**:

* Changes to support __Fast DDS Pro__ features:
  * Infrastructure modifications (#6005, #6035, #6057, #6058, #6060, #6069, #6072, #6063)
  * Add tweak version (#6012)
  * Prepare RTPSDomainImpl to be extended (#6031)
  * Support for `@feed` operations only in _Fast DDS Pro_ (#6052)
  * Add support for ethernet locator kind (#5999)
  * Add support for priority mappings in UDP (#6029)
  * Add XML tags for low bandwidth transports (#6051)
* Pass value of `TransportPriorityQosPolicy` to transport layer (#5933)
* Add field `original_writer_info` to `WriteParams` and `SampleInfo` (#5975, #5977, #6001)
* Support annotated types and builtin annotations in IDL Parser (#5908)
* Iterate over declared types processed with IDL Parser (#5954)
* Support aliases in Content Filtered Topic (#6032)

This minor release includes the following **improvements**:

* Ubuntu installers are now `.deb` packages
* Update to Fast DDS Gen 4.2.0 (#5959, #6019, #6050, #6071)
* Return sample notifying changes on instance state (#5943)
* Performance improvements with large history caches (#5986, #5997, #5998)
* Fix doxygen documentation typos (#5951, #6034)
* Change eprosima::fastdds::rtps::octet to be uint8_t according to C++11 standard (#5960)
* Add 'tcp_negotiation_timeout' to XML Schema (#5983)

This minor release includes the following **fixes**:

* Fix memory consumption issues in PKIDH plugin (#5935)
* Fix tests build with strict C++11 (#6061, #6074)
* Fix socket buffer size handling (#5926)
* Avoid setting thread affinity of 0 in mac (#5962)
* Some RPC related fixes (#5972, #5974)
* Fix latency & troughput tests names (#5938)
* Allow empty partition list to match against `"*"` (#5989)
* Fix duplicated transport when using specific XML with CLI (#5988)
* Fix topic argument in Discovery Server example (#5996)
* Some TCP transport fixes (#6073, #6066)
* Remote writers considered volatile by default (#6085)
* Fixed CPU usage issue with very short deadline period (#6016)

This minor release includes the following **CI and release management updates**:

* Prepare for 3.4.0 release (#5940, #5950, #5964, #6038, #6065, #6075, #6089)
* Add `--quiet` to `git submodule` invocations in CI (#5944)
* Split Mac CI build and testing phases (#6011)
* Update fallback branches to use environment variables (#6039)

PRs in merged order:
#5926, #5938, #5940, #5944, #5933, #5943, #5950, #5959, #5908, #5964, #5951, #5962, #5960, #5972, #5975, #5954, #5983, #5974, #5977, #5986, #5989, #5988, #6005, #6001, #5996, #6012, #5935, #5999, #5998, #6011, #5997, #6019, #6029, #6034, #6038, #6039, #6032, #6035, #6050, #6057, #6031, #6051, #6058, #6052, #6060, #6061, #6063, #6065, #6069, #6071, #6072, #6075, #6074, #6073, #6066, #6085, #6016, #6089

name: v2.14.5
body:
# Fast DDS v2.14.5

This patch release includes the following ABI compatible **features**:

1. New property to select preferred key agreement algorithm (#5444)  

This patch release includes the following **security fixes**: 

1. [CVE-2025-24807](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-24807)  

This patch release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Decouple transport receivers creation using unique network flows (#5590)  
1. Improve `max_allocations` calculation on SHM transport (#5675)  
1. Improve `PDPClients` initialization (#5507)  
1. Filter interested readers on `PDP` writer (#5672)  
1. Refactor builtin writers and readers creation (#5724)  
1. Update reception timestamp when it is added to the instance (#5826)
1. Unacknowledged sample removed in `KEEP_ALL` mode (#5625)    
1. Add localhost capability only to UDP and TCP transports (#5869)  
1. Avoid data race in `ReaderLocator` (#5841)  
1. Improve `DS` routines (#5784, #5807)  
1. Handle socket buffer size setting when system's maximum exceeded (#5562)  
1. Improve `Blackbox` TCP tests suite (#5476)   
1. Avoid calling `setIPv4` in `TCPTransportInterface` (#5893)  
1. Avoid sending statistics message with big messages and no fragmentation (#5743)  
1. Fix for `Configurability` example (#5637)  
1. Increase the announcement period in liveliness test (#5952)
1. Allow creation of built-in content filters with different type name (#5875)  
1. Update `sqlite` from `3.36.0` to `3.47.2` (#5536)  
1. Log any errors before `cancel_init()` (#5546)  
1. Add `--quiet` to git `submodule` invocations (#5947) 
1. Bump to `asio 1.34.2` (#5907)  
1. Allow domain names (DNS) when parsing TCP locators XML elements (#5448)  

This patch release includes the following **fixes**: 

1. Add pointer sanity check before accessing `ParticipantProxyData` (#5440)  
1. Fix CMake generator evaluation (#5453)  
1. Fix unique network flows with TCP transports (#5488)  
1. Fix TCP discovery server locators translation (#5437)  
1. Arithmetic overflow in fragment size calculations (#5513)  
1. Fix `double-locking` issue in `DataSharingListener` (#5522)  
1. Fix comparison in `is_update_allowed` (#5416)  
1. Use correct algorithm strings on `PermissionsToken` and `IdentityToken` (#5482)  
1. Fix `tsan` potential deadlock between `StatefulWriter` and `FlowController` (#5496)  
1. Reliable volatile change dropped when all history is `acked` (#5615)  
1. Fix log category name macro collision in MacOS (#5620)  
1. Fix `null-dereference` in `parseXMLMemberDynamicType` (#5581, #5684)  
1. Fix infinite loop when setting thread affinity (#5630)  
1. Fix build with `-Werror=template-id-cdtor` (#5422)  
1. Fix error handling logic in `try_setting_buffer_size` (#5643)  
1. Remove repeated header include and Fix log (#5661)  
1. Fix `several_writers_on_unack_sample_removed` flaky test (#5718)  
1. Fix cleanup race condition with exclusive and shared lock files (#5694)  
1. Address some compilation warnings with GCC latest (#5802) 
1. Fix `ParticipantGenericMessage` serialization (#5855)  
1. Fix build on `QNX` (#5883)  
1. Fix assertion on `OutputTrafficManager` (#5713)  
1. Fix Data `100kb CDR` version (#5923)  
1. Fix socket buffer size handling (#5921)  
1. Fix` DS` initialization on `any` if no interfaces are available (#5877)  
1. Fix `EDP` reliability timings (#5556)  
1. Fix compatibility with `Fast CDR v1` (#5958)
1. Improve resilience against clock adjustments (#5189)
1. Fix doxygen documentation for iHandle2GUID (#5967)

This patch release includes the following **CI improvements**:

1. Update `submodules` when cloning Fast DDS on CI (#5570)  
1. Force `Asio Thirdparty` in MacOS CI (#5774)  
1. Add `uncrustify` to Github CI (#5887)  
1. Get correct Fast CDR related branch (#5746)  
1. Support compiler `MSYS2-MinGW` (#5634)  
1. Use windows-2022 in CI (#5909)   


PRs in merged order:
#5440, #5453, #5488, #5437, #5513, #5522, #5416, #5482, #5536, #5546, #5570, #5590, #5496, #5615, #5620, #5625, #5581, #5562, #5630, #5422, #5637, #5643, #5675, #5661, #5507, #5672, #5718, #5694, #5724, #5774, #5826, #5869, #5841, #5887, #5855, #5883, #5713, #5746, #5634, #5684, #5909, #5802, #5893, #5743, #5907, #5923, #5921, #5448, #5556, #5947, #5952, #5877, #5444, #5784, #5476, #5958, #5807, #5875, #5957, #5961, #5189, #5967, #5973

name: v3.3.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.3.0

This minor release includes the following **features**:

1. `RPC` related:
    1. Add generic interfaces for servers (#5873)
    1. Enhanced discovery feature (#5899) 
    1. Add `RPC` over DDS example (#5829, #5837, #5894) 
    1. Add methods for `TypeObject` registration of `RPC` types (#5885, #5889)  
1. QoS Policies added to `EDP` messages. New property to send eProsima Extensions QoS (#5795)  
1. Allow `ResourceLimitsQos` serialization method compatibility (#5813)  
1. Add `WireProtocolConfigQos` to optional qos serialization and make `Monitor Service` always serialize optionals (#5818)  
1. `DataWriter` sample prefilter (#5861)  
1. Support modules in IDL Parser (#5890)  
1. New version of `EDP` static discovery (#5860)  
1. Process key-only payloads (#5897)  
1. Add `has_more_replies` to `WriteParams` and `SampleInfo` (#5898)
1. `JSON` to `DynamicData` deserializer (#5553)

This minor release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Improvements on `RPC` entities (#5801)  
1. Add regression test checking `type_information` is always copied in `ProxyData` copies (#5797)  
1. Add references to documentation (#5817) 
1. Update `ROSin` image links in `README` (#5830) 
1. Update reception timestamp when it is added to the instance (#5819)  
1. Updates  due to EOL versions (#5836, #5852, #5857, #5866)  
1. Allow creation of built-in content filters with different type name (#5867)  
1. Add `ParticipantBuiltinTopicData` header in `StatisticsDomainParticipant` (#5863)  
1. Make `DomainParticipant` creation fail if `MaxMessageSize` is lower than `PDP` package size (#5473)  
1. Avoid calling `setIPv4` in `TCPTransportInterface` (#5492)  
1. Bump `asio` to `1.34.2` (#5896)  
1. Update types for Fast DDS Gen v4.1.0 Release (#5920)

This minor release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Solve Discovery Server race conditions (#5780)  
1. Address some compilation warnings with `GCC` latest (#5796)  
1. Properly delete secure endpoints if registration fails (#5814)  
1. Add condition for `string_builder` `nullptr` on `XMLDynamicParser` in case bound is 0 (#5821)  
1. Add multicast locator to correct locator list in `ReaderProxydata` (#5842) 
1. Avoid Data Race in Reader Locator (#5833)  
1. Fix `ParticipantGenericMessage` serialization (#5843)  
1. Fix build on `QNX` (#5871)  
1. Fix custom feature IDL files (#5903)  
1. Uncrustify to all `ipp` files (#5891)  
1. Fix `null-dereference` error on Ubuntu (#5895)
1. Add localhost capability only to `UDP` and  `TCP` transports (#5864)  
1. Fix DS initialization on `"any"` if no interfaces are available (#5850)  

This minor release includes the following **ci improvements**:

1. Move `SimpleCommunication` and `system tests` in Windows nightly (#5789)  
1. Split Windows workflow in different test suites (#5849)  
1. Add compilation with `GCC` latest to `fastdds_alternative_builds` Ubuntu CI (#5799)  
1. Add uncrustify to Github CI (#5878)  
1. Increase the warning level for Ubuntu CI's compilation (#5067)  
1. Include all example tests in Windows CI (#5851)  
1. Add `VS143` toolset to Windows CI (#5910)  
1. Install Fix `OpenSSL` version in windows example testing (#5918)
1. Set Windows 10 as Tier 1 (#5922) 

PRs in merged order:
#5789, #5780, #5797, #5796, #5799, #5795, #5801, #5813, #5818, #5814, #5817, #5821, #5819, #5830, #5829, #5836, #5837, #5833, #5852, #5842, #5843, #5857, #5853, #5866, #5864, #5861, #5863, #5867, #5850, #5473, #5849, #5873, #5871, #5878, #5492, #5885, #5891, #5067, #5890, #5860, #5896, #5903, #5889, #5851, #5894, #5899, #5897, #5898, #5910, #5918, #5895, #5922, #5920, #5553, #5925, #5924

name: v2.6.10
body:
# Fast DDS v2.6.10

According to our [release support guidelines](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/blob/master/RELEASE_SUPPORT.md#release-support) the `v2.6` minor only receive patches for critical issues and security fixes.

This release includes the following **critical fixes**:

1. Fix [CVE-2025-24807](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-24807)
1. Discard changes with big key-only payload and no key hash (#5276)
1. Update types regeneration script homing path (#5107)
1. Fix topic interference on liveliness_changed status (#5046)

This release includes the following **improvements**:
  
1. Add `unsigned` specification to literals (#5174)
1. Update commercial support section in README (#5324)
1. Update `sqlite` from 3.36.0 to 3.47.2 (#5538)

This release includes the following **ci management updates**:

1. Exclude flaky tests when compiling without security (#5037)
1. Fix python version in sanitizers CI (#5077)
1. Fix windows CI and add vanilla build step in ubuntu CI (#5099)
1. Update submodules when cloning Fast DDS on CI (#5572)
1. Add Ubuntu weekly CI (#5068)
1. Allow running CI on external contributions (#5290)
1. Use `eProsima-CI` action to install `Qt` (#5194)
1. Add references to new nightly jobs per supported branch in README (#5301) 

PRs in merged order:
#5037, #5077, #5099, #5068, #5174, #5107, #5290, #5194, #5301, #5276, #5324, #5046, #5538, #5572, #5771

name: v3.2.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.2.0

This minor release includes the following **features**:

1. Implementation of `get_matched_publication/subscription()` `DataReader/Writer` API (#5312)
1. Extended incompatible QoS for monitor service (#5385)
1. Transform locators using new `machine_id` PID (#5382)
1. New property to select preferred key agreement algorithm (#5413)
1. Parse IDL file on `DynamicTypeBuilderFactory::create_type_w_uri` (#4943, #5567, #5559, #5640)
1. Fast DDS `ROS2_EASY_MODE` (#5548, #5689, #5593, #5665)
1. Add `RPC` related interfaces (#5687)
1. Extend `QoS` in discovery data (#5712) 

---

This release includes the following **improvements**:

**Transport:**

1. Check if SHM transport is disabled in `LARGE_DATA` modes (#5355)
1. Allow domain names (DNS) when parsing TCP locators XML elements (#5429)
1. Improve `Blackbox` TCP tests suite (#5467) 
1. Decouple transport receivers creation using unique network flows (#5583)
1. Improve `max_allocations` calculation on SHM transport (#5659) 
1. Improve SHM configuration on large data transports (#5725)

**Discovery:**

name: v3.0.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.0.0

This release includes the following **API** breaks:

1. XTypes refactor (#4042, #3974, #4496, #4497, #4190, #4368, #4640, #4240, #4712, #4626, #4746, #4901, #4874, #4969, #4970, #4985, #5000, #4780, #4787, #5092, #4768, #5091)
    * Regenerated IDL files with types header-only fastddsgen version (#4042)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` (#4190)
    * Implementation of ``TypeLookup`` listeners (#4240)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicTypeBuilderFactoryImpl::create_type_w_type_object`` (#4368)
    * Re-implementation of ``TypeObjectRegistry`` and ``TypeObjectUtils`` classes (#3974)
    * Partial implementation of X-Types1.3 (#4640)
    * Structure ``DynamicType`` inheritance from ``TypeObject`` (#4712)
    * Automatic ``TypeObject`` representation registration for ``DynamicTypes`` (#4746)
    * Refactor ``TypeObjectRegistry`` (#4874)
    * Fix proxy block in ``TypeLookup`` service (#4901)
    * Added Annotation dependencies (#4497)
    * Dynamic language binding tests (#4626)
    * Improve X-Types interoperability (#4985)
    * Only signed integers are allowed in Dynamic Language Binding enumerations (#4969)
    * Refactor XML Parser to return ``DynamicTypeBuilder`` instead of ``DynamicType`` (#4970)
    * Make more flexible ``EDP::valid_matching`` with ``TypeInformation`` (#5000)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicData`` to JSON serializer (#4780)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` to IDL serializer (#4787)
    * Fixes for indirect hashes dependencies (#4496)
    * Add missing ``DynamicType`` includes (#5092)
    * Add new tests for testing new key hash calculation according to DDS-XTypes 1.3 (#5091)
    * Support ``Type-Lookup`` Service with new new GUID-less Discovery Server (#4768)
1. Migration from RTPS to DDS (#4288, #4270, #4269, #4518, #4872, #4898, #4962, #4930, #5065)
    * Migrate fastrtps namespace to fastdds (#4898)
    * Migrate classes from ``include/fastrtps`` to ``include/fastdds`` (#4518)
    * Remove ``include/fastrtps`` (#4930)
    * Migrate ``fixed_size_string`` file from fastrtps to fastcdr (#4269)
    * Migrate ``ResourceManagement`` to rtps attributes API (#4962)
    * Remove ``RTPSParticipant`` listener overloaded callbacks (#4872)
    * Move ``Time_t`` to dds namespace and some attributes to ``xmlparser`` (#5065)
    * Migrate communication tests (#4288)
    * Remove deprecated fastrtps tests (#4270)
1. Make private previously public API (#4318, #4545, #4671, #4546, #4727, #4657, #4674, #4705, #4792, #4701, #4869, #4923, #4953, #5052, #5078, #5085)
    * Make private the necessary headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4545)
    * Make XML Parser API private (#4318)
    * Remove all redundant headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4546)
    * Make RTPS messages headers private (#4657)
    * Make RTPS reader implementations private (#4674)
    * Make RTPS writer impl private (#4869)
    * Make security private (#4792)
    * Make ``NetworkConfiguration`` private (#4671)
    * Make ``ResourceEvent`` private (#4705)
    * Make ``TimedEvent`` private (#4727)
    * Remove ``WriterProxyData`` from public APIs (#5052)
    * Remove ``ReaderProxyData`` from public APIs (#5078)
    * Remove ``TopicAttributes`` from public APIs and make it private in ``xmlparser`` (#5085)
    * Remove unnecessary header and make private ``SecurityException`` and ``Exception`` (#4701)

1. Set 2.12.x as EOL (#4559)
1. Use a plain switch for `NetmaskFilterKind` `operator<<` (#4587)
1. Set real TCP `non_blocking_send` limitation (#4502)
1. Increase ack waiting time in `reliable_on_unack_sample_removed` (#4627)
1. Enforce SHM ports open mode exclusions (#4635)
1. Force unlimited ResourceLimits if lower or equal to zero (#4617)
1. Allow processing of AckNack submessages with `count == 0` (#4639)
1. Refactor IStatusQueryable and make monitor service interfaces private (#4651)
1. Internal refactor on port handling (#3440)
1. Improve `ThreadSettingsQoS` logging (#4744)
1. Run `is_plain` method with the corresponding data representation (#4681)
1. Address compilation issue for GLIBC version (#4753)
1. Repository and test improvements:
    1. Run Github Ubuntu CI on PRs (#4598)
    1. Only run PRs CI when a review is requested (#4599)
    1. Improve filtering of DNS tests (#4603)
    1. Make `sample_lost_be_dw_be_dr_fragments` test less flaky (#4620)
    1. Build Fast DDS Python bindings in Fast DDS Docs Github CI job (#4628)
    1. Add check for XML API to PR template (#4658)
    1. Refactor Github CI sanitizer related jobs (#4662)
    1. Increase sleep to miss the deadline in macOS flaky tests (#4636)
    1. Fix nightly sanitizer CI workflow name (#4682)
    1. Improve xml loading method in fuzz_XMLProfiles (#4685)
    1. Build ShapesDemo on Ubuntu Github CI (#4678)
    1. Correctly set branches for `reusable-sanitizers-ci` (#4695)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Address XMLProfiles fuzzer regressions (#4554)
1. Fix flaky Log tests (#4582)
1. Fix hidden overloaded virtual methods (#4516)
1. Effectively assert `automatic/manual_by_participant` liveliness (#4501)
1. Fix `on_sample_lost` notification on best-effort readers for fragmented samples (#4187)
1. Monitor service properly managing instances (#4564)
1. Fix CVE-2024-30258 & CVE-2024-30259
1. Fix Discovery Server over TCP using `LocatorSelectorEntry` (#4586)
1. Removed warning (#4693)
1. Make `get_first_untaken_info()` coherent with `read()/take()` (#4696)
1. Fix serialization of Data(w)/Data(r) in MonitorService (#4670)
1. Bugfix in `DDSBlackboxTestsDataReader` test (#4720)
1. Fix leak in `SecurityManager::participant_volatile_message_secure_writer_` (#4673)
1. Fix some leaks in XML DynamicTypes Parser (#4717)
1. Fix support for `@key` annotation in Dynamic types (#4694)
1. Fix SecurityTest unittests memory error (#4750)
1. Fix Python Installation version in Github CI. Address failing system tests environment issues (#4759)

PRs in merged order:

name: v2.14.0
body:
# Fast DDS v2.14.0

:loudspeaker:  **IMPORTANT**: Fast DDS v2.14 will be the last minor version of Fast DDS v2, the next major release will be Fast DDS v3.0.0, stay tuned! :radio:

This release includes the following **new features**:

1. Add netmask filter transport configuration (#4241)
1. Add interface allowlist and blocklist (#4241)
1. Expose Security Authentication plugin Handshake Properties (#4435)
1. Extend LARGE_DATA configuration options (#4444)
1. Allow single listening port on TCP (#4348)
1. OpenOutputChannels / CloseOutputChannels that receive a LocatorSelectorEntry (#4411)
1. Support GTest v1.14.0 (#4448)
1. Update Fast CDR submodule to v2.2.0 (#4575)
1. Update roadmap and release support (#4579)

This release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Ignore custom PIDs defined in Fast DDS when they are received from other vendors (#4299)
1. Add catch of out-of-range exception for thread settings port (#4461)
1. Explicitly pass vendor ID to readFromCdrMessage (#4583)
1. TCP transport improvements:
    1. TCPSendResources cleanup (#4300)
    1. TCP non_blocking_send moved to TCPTransportDescriptor (#4415)
1. Various repository improvements and housekeeping:
    1. Migrate communication tests to the DDS API (#4290)
    1. Migrate TCPReqRepHelloWorldReplier/Requester to the DDS API (#4296)
    1. Update APIs in video performance tests to the DDS API (#4464)
    1. Remove FASTDDS_TODO_BEFORE 2.14 (#4445)
    1. Remove use of deprecated FindPythonInterp (#4447)
    1. Remove idl parser from .repos file (#4535)
    1. Force usage of semicolon in FASTDDS_TODO_BEFORE macro (#4452)
    1. Ubuntu example testing automation infrastructure (#4466)
1. Multiple Github CI improvements:
    1. Add nightly Ubuntu Github CI (#4109)
    1. Improve CI version management (#4480)
    1. Avoid running GitHub CI if PR has conflicts (#4489)
    1. Migrate apt package installation to eProsima-CI action (#4515)
    1. Include missing nightly for 3.0.x branch (#4548)
    1. Adapt nightly jobs for all supported versions (#4549)
    1. Pin CMake version and vm.mmap_rnd_bits in sanitizer workflows (#4558)
    1. Select reusable workflow version depending on target branch in nightly jobs (#4581)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Fix warnings when compiling for Windows x86 (#4451)
1. TCP first message loss (#4454)
1. Fix warnings on tests on Windows 32bits (#4494)
1. Protect asio exception hotfix (#4527)
1. Fix CVE-2024-28231
1. Github CI fixes:
    1. Fix CI documentation workflow label triggering (#4456)
    1. Fix nightly jobs (#4525)
    1. Fix input branch on reusable windows CI (#4539)
    1. Use correct version of GTest on DS ASan tests (#4571)
